meanings.definition: A person who deserts and betrays an organization, country, or set of principles.
meanings.sent1: The renegades were once loyal members of the team.
meanings.sent2: The renegades abandoned their cause and joined the enemy.
meanings.sent3: The renegades decided to switch sides in the middle of the battle.
meanings.sent4: The renegades' betrayal left a scar on the organization.
meanings.sent5: The renegades' actions will be remembered for years to come.

meanings.definition: A group of people who reject conventional behavior or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The renegades challenged the traditional ways of thinking.
meanings.sent2: The renegades stood out from the crowd with their unique ideas.
meanings.sent3: The renegades' unconventional approach surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The renegades were like a breath of fresh air in the stale environment.
meanings.sent5: The renegades' rebellious spirit inspired others to think differently.
